post:
Hello,

We have a new promotion for our **Premium I** VPS package.

<H1>LIMITED STOCK!</H1>

<h2>Premium I</h2>
* 2GB DDR4 RAM
* 50GB NVMe SSD
* 1 CPU core (I9-9900K)
* 500Mbit uplink @ unlimited (FUP)
* OVH DDoS protection
* Located in The Netherlands

For €6,- per month (recurring discount)
Normal price: €15,-

[Order here](https://clients.finalhosting.nl/cart.php?a=add&pid=205&promocode=I9-DISCOUNT) and use discountcode: **I9-DISCOUNT** (1 per customer)

More details: [click here](https://finalhosting.nl/products/vps/premium)

<H1>LIMITED STOCK!</H1>

Pleace notice IF you are living in the EU and don't have a valid VAT number, you will pay VAT. The percentage depends on the country in which you live.

<hr>

<h2>Customer control panel</h2>
We have created a very comprehensive control panel for our customers, listed below are the most important features:

* Uploading your own ISO
* Mount/unmount an ISO
* Change boot order
* Change network adapter
* Create & restore a backup
* VNC
* Reinstall
* Reset password
* Start, stop, reboot
* Create and remove firewall rules for DDoS protected IPv4 addresses.

Your sexy customer control panel:
![](https://i.imgur.com/DakG7nF.png)

<hr>

<h2>Payment methods</h2>

**Local payment options**

* iDeal
* ING Home'pay
* Bankcontact
* Belfius betaalknop
* KBC/CBC
* Pay by phone

**Other payment options**

* Paypal
* Paysafecard
* Mybank
* Przelewy24
* Bitcoin
* SEPA recurring
* SEPA transfer
* Sofort Banking

<hr>

<h2>Business information</h2>
Website: [https://finalhosting.nl](https://finalhosting.nl)
Customer panel: [https://clients.finalhosting.nl](https://clients.finalhosting.nl)

KvK number (Dutch business registration): 54033721

Hope to see you soon!
